dct_title_s: Sauer's map of the city of Detroit and environs Michigan: a general map of Detroit and suburbs including the entire metropolitan area wihtin a radius of fourteen miles from the city hall, showing all highways steam and electric railways ...
dct_description_sm: Compiled and drawn by Wm. Sauer.
Insets: Map of interurban car lines -- Downtown location map -- Belle Isle Park. Title from cover. Street index on verso. 1 map: col.; 69 x 102 cm.
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library. https://www.lib.umich.edu/about-us/policies/copyright-policy
